</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if a soldier's hands are hit, which results in inaccurate aiming. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''handsHit''' unitName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] -  
If the hands aren't damaged, the returned value is 0. If the hands are hit or the unit is dead, the returned value is 1. </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>? (handsHit [[player]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 1) : [[player]] [[globalChat]] "Ouch! Don't shoot at my hands dammit!"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
